item.title: Conical CIP

Equipment Needed CIP Pump CIP Spray Ball 1.5" TC Brewery hose to connect CIP Pump to CIP Spray Ball Alkaline Brewery Wash White wash basin 2" TC straight 8" run to return to basin Hazards Identification and PPE / Safety Steps Required: PPE: Eye protection, rubber boots, gloves
